pageContext.claim: “We can't protect rich nations, really, really successful rich nations. We protect them, and they don't pay us for the protection, or they pay us a small fraction. It's not fair. And I tell them, sorry, it's not fair, and we're working it out.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump wrongly claims the U.S. does not get any -- or even much -- reimbursement for when it houses troops in Germany, Japan and South Korea. Moreover, the deployments also help keep the United States secure; it is not just a matter of a cash transaction.
